params.listingId: ID of the listing to cancel

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the ecosystem with token contract and Unlock locks

createListing(string,uint256,uint256).details: Create a new marketplace listing for processed waste material

getAccessibleListingIds().details: Get all active listings with access permissions

returns._0: Array of active listing IDs that the caller can access

hasValidMembership(address,uint8).details: Check if user has valid membership for a specific role

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.quantityToBuy: Quantity to buy in kg (with 2 decimal precision)

purchaseMembership(uint8).details: Purchase membership NFT for a specific role

params.membershipType: The type of membership to purchase

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateWasteRewardRate(string,uint256).details: Update reward rate for a waste type

params.newRate: New reward rate in tokens per kg

verifyWasteCollection(address,string,uin.details: Called by authorized verifiers to verify waste collection and reward collectors

params.amount: Amount collected in kg (with 2 decimal precision)

verifyWasteProcessing(address,string,uin.details: Called by authorized verifiers to verify waste processing by recyclers

params.amount: Amount processed in kg (with 2 decimal precision)
